q1: What did you think of Croatia's performance at the recent world cup?
a1: I thought they did really well to score against France.
q2: I agree. It's fun to cheer for the underdog.
a2: Can't help disliking Croatia, don't know why though ?
q3: Even after seeing how much success meant to them?
a3: Success meant a lot! It is truly evident!
q4: They played to the best of their abilities and made France earn their win, you have to respect the skills of the Croatian team atleast.
a4: Yes the team croatia have good skills
q5: What do you think the best skills that team Croatia have?
a5: Croatia best skill is their mindset. They keep going no matter what!
q6: How will they fare in the Euros?
a6: I believe that Croatia will do very well, considering that they still have many young players.
